Posts.Content: mylee wrote: hello! i am 31 years old and have to get mammograms every year now because my mom had breast cancer. i just got the results back and the doc said i have to go get a diagnostic mammogram and ultrasound because there is some possible asymetry and density in my right breast. The results said that there are no calcifications or masses in either breast. with that said, they said because there are no calcifications or masses, that i have nothing to worry about....but, i am so scared still! has anyone had this same experience? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Scared about mammo results mylee LISAMG
